description.narrative: Altogether 13 projects will come to the conclusion in Eastern Africa in the end of 2015. Of the completed projects, two in Burundi, five in Kenya, and two in Tanzania will be combined into three new projects, one per each country. The regional child sponso rship project (5251) will become one component of the regional coordination project (5260). Regional partner?s leadership enhancement project will be completed, because the work will be increasingly aimed towards the grassroots level beneficiaries. In Buru ndi HIV/AIDS-project (5282) is completed, because the target is to answer more acute needs. Year 2016 Fida will continue to work in Burundi, Kenya, Tanzania, Ethiopia, and Uganda. There will be six continuing projects and four new ones, which are combined from former projects, thus there will be altogether 10 projects. At the 2016, two projects will be completed in Ethiopia because of the budget cuts, partner?s poor capacity, and because of the country?s cumbersome bureaucracy. Year 2016 the regional work w ill focus on the reduction of poverty and inequality by defending the human rights of the vulnerable people, as well as by reducing the diseases and mortality of children and other vulnerable groups. During year 2016 the aim will be to ensure a participato ry approach on all levels, and to ensure, in particular, the voice belonging to the marginalised. Strengthening the capacity of partner?s will go on. In addition, the aim is to increase the level of local partners? financial contribution from 10% to 40% by the end of the year 2016. During the year monitoring will be developed to function better. Networking with other NGOs will be increased.
